data.name: Far Cry 5: Inside Eden’s Gate
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Rumors of a fanatical cult called The Project at Eden's Gate lure three vloggers to remote Hope County, Montana. Following leads of missing locals and other strange events, the three infiltrate the cult. Shocked by what they uncover, they risk everything to warn the world.
data.about_the_game: Rumors of a fanatical cult called The Project at Eden's Gate lure three vloggers to remote Hope County, Montana. Following leads of missing locals and other strange events, the three infiltrate the cult. Shocked by what they uncover, they risk everything to warn the world.
data.short_description: Watch the full Inside Eden's Gate film!

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: Windows 7
  • 处理器: 英特尔酷睿 2 处理器或相同性能的 AMD 处理器
  • 内存: 1 GB RAM
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: 5Mbit/s 的网络带宽适合 540p，3Mbit/s 的网络带宽适合 360p。
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: Windows 10
  • 处理器: 推荐搭载英特尔酷睿 I3 和以上的处理器，或相同性能的 AMD 处理器播放 1080p 高清视频
  • 内存: 2 GB RAM
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: 12Mbit/s 的网络带宽适合 1080p，8Mbit/s 的网络带宽适合 720p。
